Actions.Name: Stream Countdown Timer
Actions.Tooltip: Set a timer on your Stream Deck, and have it shown on your Stream too

Author: BarRaider
Description:
Set a timer on your Stream Deck, and have it shown on your Stream too. Will start flashing in a color of your choice when the time is up.
New: Sound Support! Streamathon mode - increase the time left on every key press
Name: Stream Countdown Timer
